body: You scaredy  cats, it'll be fiiiine.
Oh that's not it. He got jealous bc he thought some guy was hitting on her or just some friendly male classmates then became aware of his immaturity.

Last panel looks cute tho, mc has been worrying bc he's got told that he's cute(rather childish in his own interpretation) then waifu realized why he's gotten to that gloomy mood. Nothing ntr will happen here my fellow lambs.
Just need Ntr sidedish for this one shame it's  vanilla all the way
oh for the love of god please don't go to the NTR route. I don't understand Japanese but stories this wholesome rarely stay wholesome and the last panels didn't look good.
Ugh I’m already mentally preparing this to be ntr

AFter dsefds the mind was like why Christianity? Because all its prophecies should be 100% correct - the true God does this, Eternal life is free, gained by faith in jesus when you die. Can't earn it by payments, good works, following all laws but we still try.
